createCertificateOneClick.title: Create Certificate Faster
createCertificateOneClick.subTitle: More practical: The platform generates the certificate and private key for the device.

createCertificateCSR.title: Submit a Certificate Signing Request (CSR)
createCertificateCSR.subTitle: More secure: The platform generates a certificate but has no knowledge of the private key.

csrHelpSteps.step1Text: Run the command: openssl req  -newkey 'rsa:2048'  -nodes  -sha256  -keyout 'privatekey.pem'  -out 'csr.pem'  -subj '/CN=Any value'
csrHelpSteps.step2Text: Copy the contents of the csr.pem file into the text area below.

createCertificateCA.title: Use My Certificate
createCertificateCA.subTitle: Enables you to use your existing public key infrastructure.
createCertificateCA.inputDataLabel: Enter the data in order: from device certificate to root CA. According to the degree of importance.

generatedCertificateResume.certificateAndKeysTitle: To connect a device you need to download the following items:
